name: Catch Those Bugs!
description:
Launch your jar into the flies, but try not to hit the beetles! This game was made in 72 hours for the Mini-Jam 73 with a limitation of only using 5 colors. The colors I used were: #45354A, #A55455, #8DA681, #609C6C, #D3BE7C.

Controls:

  • W to launch UP
  • S to launch DOWN
  • A to rotate LEFT
  • D to rotate Right
